Thief.desc: The Thief class excels at pickpocketing, mugging, and backstabbing unsuspecting foes.
Thief.name: Thief

PartyOffense0.name: PartyOffense0
PartyOffense0.desc: Increase your offensive capabilities while in a party.

PartyOffense1.name: PartyOffense1
PartyOffense1.desc: Increase your offensive capabilities while in a party.

PartyOffense2.name: PartyOffense2
PartyOffense2.desc: Increase your offensive capabilities while in a party.

CarefulTouch0.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by 10% per point.

CarefulTouch1.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by 10% per point.

CarefulTouch2.name: CarefulTouch2
CarefulTouch2.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by 10% per point.

DeathGrip0.name: DeathGrip0
DeathGrip0.desc: Decrease your chance of dropping items on death by 5% per point.

DeathGrip1.desc: Decrease your chance of dropping items on death by 5% per point.

DeathGrip2.name: DeathGrip2

NaturalArmor1.desc: Harden your skin, increasing your natural armor class by 2 per point.

NaturalArmor2.name: NaturalArmor2
NaturalArmor2.desc: Harden your skin, increasing your natural armor class by 2 per point.

NimbleStealing0.name: NimbleStealing0
NimbleStealing0.desc: You are less likely to be discovered when stealing, and you steal more gold when you are successful.

NimbleStealing1.name: NimbleStealing1
NimbleStealing1.desc: You are less likely to be discovered when stealing, and you steal more gold when you are successful.

NimbleStealing2.name: NimbleStealing2
NimbleStealing2.desc: You are less likely to be discovered when stealing, and you steal more gold when you are successful.

DoubleStealing0.name: DoubleStealing0
DoubleStealing0.desc: You will use both hands when stelaing, if possible.

Ninja.desc: The Ninja class is one that focuses on the shadows. They are not often seen or heard.
Ninja.name: Ninja

Rogue.desc: The Rogue is a class that focuses on the finer thievery arts, such as setting and disarming traps, blending in with enemies, and looting valuable items.
Rogue.name: Rogue

OffhandFinesse0.desc: Increase your offhand attack damage by 10% per point.

OffhandFinesse1.name: OffhandFinesse1
OffhandFinesse1.desc: Increase your offhand attack damage by 10% per point.

OffhandFinesse4.desc: Increase your offhand attack damage by 10% per point.

PhilosophersStone0.desc: You get 10% more gold per point when you transmute items.

PhilosophersStone1.desc: You get 10% more gold per point when you transmute items.

PhilosophersStone2.name: PhilosophersStone2
PhilosophersStone2.desc: You get 10% more gold per point when you transmute items.

WiderTraps1.desc: Your area of effect traps are wider.

WiderTraps2.name: WiderTraps2
WiderTraps2.desc: Your area of effect traps are wider.

AdvancedTraps0.name: AdvancedTraps0
AdvancedTraps0.desc: You can buy advanced traps from the thief vendors.

ReusableTraps0.desc: Your traps can be triggered 1 more time per point.

ReusableTraps1.name: ReusableTraps1
ReusableTraps1.desc: Your traps can be triggered 1 more time per point.

LockpickSpecialty0.desc: Your lockpicking ability is slightly increased.

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.desc: Identify the attributes of the item in your right hand. Cost: 15 MP

Transmute.name: Transmute
Transmute.desc: Convert the items on your current tile into gold. Cost: 15 MP

EagleEye.name: EagleEye
EagleEye.desc: See through the trees and to the depths of the waters. Cost: 50 HP

Disguise.name: Disguise
Disguise.desc: Blend in with enemies. Cost: 100 HP

Set.name: Set
Set.desc: Set a trap from your hand. Traps can be purchased from thief vendors.

Disarm.name: Disarm
Disarm.desc: Disarm a trap on an adjacent tile.

Assassin.desc: The Assassin class focuses strongly on lethal thief arts, such as applying poisons to their weapons and inflicting violent diseases on their foes.
Assassin.name: Assassin

ShadowDaggers0.name: ShadowDaggers0
ShadowDaggers0.desc: Your plain melee attacks turn into backstabs 1% of the time per point.

ShadowDaggers1.desc: Your plain melee attacks turn into backstabs 1% of the time per point.

ShadowDaggers2.name: ShadowDaggers2
ShadowDaggers2.desc: Your plain melee attacks turn into backstabs 1% of the time per point.

ShadowRanger1.desc: Do 10% more damage while hidden per point.

ShadowRanger2.name: ShadowRanger2

DegenerativeDisease0.desc: Your Disease spell will also lower the perception of the afflicted target.

CorrosivePoison0.name: CorrosivePoison0
CorrosivePoison0.desc: Your Poison spell will also lower the mitigation of the afflicted target.

RecuperatingDebilitation0.desc: Your Debilitate spell will cool down 5s faster per point.

RecuperatingDebilitation3.name: RecuperatingDebilitation3

Apply.name: Apply
Apply.desc: Apply a bottle's effects from your left hand onto your weapon strikes.

Assassinate.name: Assassinate
Assassinate.desc: Attempt to assassinate your target from the shadows. Requires weapon skill 13.

Debilitate.name: Debilitate
Debilitate.desc: Increase your targets vulnerability to backstabs. Cost: 100 HP

Poison.name: Poison
Poison.desc: Inflict a deadly poison on your target. Cost: 15 MP

Disease.name: Disease
Disease.desc: Inflict a deadly disease on your target. Cost: 30 MP
